weapon.name: sling
weapon.effect: 10" range. Quick shot - can fire twice if stationary. May move full move distance and fire once.

weapon.name: spear
weapon.effect: REACH - Cannot counter Attack against spear/bill unless armed with spear/bill

weapon.name: improvised two handed weapon
weapon.effect: SLOW - Will always act second if counter Attacked. Cannot equip shield with this weapon

weapon.name: crossbow
weapon.effect: Long up 20"/short up 10" range. Can move 3" and shot at short range. Slow - will always act second if counter Attacked. Bodkin -ignore one Defence die if target is wearing mail at shot range. Causes shock at short range if 25% casualties are caused
